thread.title: The Ultimate Barbecue

author: The Telegraph
title: The Ultimate Barbecue
text: Don't miss your two 40-page booklets, which will be free inside The Telegraph on August 15 & 16. The booklets are filled with a succulent selection of beef, pork, poultry, seafood and vegetable recipes which are easy to follow. With 40 recipes to choose from, there is something to suit every taste and budget. Learn how to make mouth-watering Korean-style beef burgers, bacon-wrapped pork chops with bourbon sauce, lobster tails with basil and lemon butter, and Mexican-style corn on the cob. With everything from the traditional dishes of slow-cooked country ribs, spicy chicken drumsticks and tuna steaks, to the more exotic fare of horseradish-crusted sirloin steaks and spice-rubbed duck breasts, you'll want to fire up the barbecue, pour a glass of something cold and hope for blue skies. Whether you're entertaining friends and family or simply rustling up a post-work surprise for your partner, The Ultimate Barbecue booklets should be your culinary companion for the rest of the summer. Simply pick up The Telegraph on August 15 & 16 for your free The Ultimate Barbecue booklets. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
